intro1.title: Link everything in one short link.
intro1.description: Create your own digital page in minutes. One link in bio, and it's free!

intro2.title: Customize your bio link in minutes
intro2.description: Tik Tok, Twitter, Youtube, other social accounts, websites, stores  in one page, connect your social accounts, websites, stores and display your contents.

intro3.title: Share your link and Explore new links
intro3.description: Add your unique Link to all the platforms and places you find your audience.Explore the new links what you interest.

register.title: THE TOP LINK - Register
register.failedMsg: Register failed, please try again later.
register.usernameLong: username must be between 4 and 16 characters long.
register.usernameLeast: username must be at least 4 characters long.
register.usernameMost: username cannot be longer than 16 characters.
register.usernameNumber: user name must not be pure numbers
register.usernameSpecial: user name cannot contain special characters
register.tagExceed: Tag character length cannot exceed 30 characters
register.tagCustom: Enter a custom label and press Enter to add

about.a1: Answer: TOP LINK is a free bio-link homepage. Currently it supports Chinese and English. Tik Tok, Twitter, Youtube, other social accounts, websites, stores in one page, connect your social accounts, websites, stores and display your contents. Expect to become a web3 entry in the future.
about.a2: Answer: THE.TOP short-chain domain name is easy to remember and display; the theme page is more elegant; and at the same time, deepening the exploration service makes the website more social and promotional.
about.q3: 3. What do I need to know before register?
about.a3: Answer: 1. The website is currently in the public beta stage; 2. Registered customers in the public beta stage will receive Gold Label certification, and all functions will be free in the later stage, and they will always have the management and revenue permissions of independent pages; 3. The prohibited external link information will be directly blocked and deleted.
about.a4: A: We are a group of people who love technology and want to find their home in the network. Our operation mode is the prototype of DAO mode, and we also hope that more like-minded friends will contact us.
about.a5: Answer: This site uses React.js to build views and interactions, and the Python programming language develops the backend of the site. At present, the functions of the website are custom external link aggregation pages and exploration page functions. It is expected that the public beta will be completed in Q1 in 2023, reaching the functions and more theme templates of similar link aggregation websites; Q2 will release custom page permissions , increase the number of users Strengthen the social exploration function; Q3 adds user authentication system, develops access to web3; Q4 adds customer statistics and analysis system, and strengthens platform sharing and cooperation. Welcome to put forward valuable suggestions and opinions in the feedback link at the bottom of our website, and we will solve it as soon as possible.
